transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha boliye sir.
Executive: Ha good morning sir ji, mai indiamart.com se baat kar raha tha. Wo abhi sir ji se baat hua tha?
Customer: Ji ji sir ke sath baat hui thi boliye na.
Executive: Ha sir se hui thi na abhi baat unhone bola tha ki wo ek baar aapse connect karne ke liye. Wo kal meeting hui thi.
Customer: Ji ji. To kal jaise Pooja ke sath meeting hui thi aur sir ne mere ko ek do feedback bataye. Ki wo hum jaise lead vagera aap log use karte ho aur usme hazar piece likha hota hai but jab buyer se baat hoti hai to fir wo ek piece hi bolta hai aisa kuch, right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai to ye kuch lead me aata hai ya almost lead me aisa hi issue hai?
Customer: Jyada karke sir wahi lead me aata hai.
Executive: Aur aise shoes ke regarding nahi hai sab iske regarding hai wo.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To sabse main problem kya aati hai? Ki quantity likhi hoti hai jyada but buyer se jab baat karte hai to wo chota mangta hai quantity, aisa kuch?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Okay. Aap akele aap hi dekhte ho koi aur bhi dekhta hai IndiaMART?
Customer: Nahi sir filhal mai hi dekhta hu.
Executive: Okay. Kyuki isme na ek cheez aapko ye check karni hogi, thoda sa dhyan ye dena hota hai ki kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki buyer na quantity ki jagah me na na jyada samajh ke usko waha rate likh deta hai ya waha apna budget likh deta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jaise hum log dekhte hai na quantity hazar. Ab jaise mere samne aapka ek lead vagera open hai. To ye Jarar Uttar Pradesh ki lead hai mens bicycle ki ek lead dikh rahi hai. Ab yaha par quantity likhi hai 1000 piece. Colour black, tyre size any, order value 10 se 20 lakh, business use is tarah se.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Aur isme agar aap check karoge to iski buyer details me available hai mobile number aur email ID.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To isse ek cheez ye samajh me aati hai ki majorly jo buyer hai wo koi business wala nahi hai kyuki business wala hota to yaha GST details bhi likhi hoti. To is buyer ne hazar rupay ki range ki bicycle mere khyal se ye IndiaMART par search kar raha hoga waha isne quantity me hazar dal diya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye aapko thoda sa identify karna padega kyuki isme IndiaMART is vajah se fail hota hai kyuki buyer khud se dal raha hai lead ko aur quantity ki jagah rate dal de raha hai.
Customer: Jyada kar IndiaMART me sir yahi ho raha hai jo customers aane chahiye to jo individual customer hai na.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wo jyada aa rahe hai. Mere hisab se just like a reel dekh ke nahi kya koi jaise reel pe batate itne ka product itne me start kijiye business. Wo dekh ke jyada kar aise aa rahe hai aise lag raha hai mujhe. To wo jo end customer hai to unko to mere khyal se ek do jute ek do jodi chahiye hote honge maximum na.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Aur isme aap ho bhi system pe?
Executive: Ji kya bole sir?
Customer: Aap system pe ho?
Executive: Ha sir system pe hu abhi mai.
Executive: Thik hai ek baar by lead pe aaiyega please.
Customer: Email ID sir?
Executive: By lead pe na IndiaMART pe. Ha by lead pe hu sir.
Customer: Aap all over India karte ho ye sab kuch GST verify karna hai bole na aap?
Customer: GST verify? Nahi mai to ye cheez aapse isliye puch raha hu wapas se kyuki ho sakta hai do teen aise point jo shayad Pooja ne miss kare honge wo mai aapko bata pau.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai sir.
Executive: Ab wo usme aap mujhe bata dena ki wo usne cover kiya tha ki nahi kyuki mai majorly wahi points isme yaha pe cover karunga jo miss out hoga.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai sir.
Executive: By lead pe aaya?
Customer: Ha by lead pe hu sir.
Executive: Thik hai location aap all over India karte ho Maharashtra karte ho?
Customer: Jyadatar all over India hi karte hai.
Executive: Thik hai to location me pehle Maharashtra select karo fir India select karo.
Customer: Ek minute sir kyuki net nahi chal raha hai. Ek minute mai waha sara change kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir chalu kya hai band karke tabhi bhi chal raha nahi hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai sir.
Customer: Sir aapko call back karu kya mai kyuki internet nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Net nahi chal raha hai?
Customer: Ji ji wahi to.
Executive: Dekhiye wifi se connected hai kaise?
Customer: Wifi se connected hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Ek minute mai check karta hu thoda.
Customer: Actually call par hai na sir isliye internet bhi nahi chal raha mobile ka.
Executive: Aisa kya? Wifi waisa nahi laga hua hai ye kya hotspot se connected hai kya mobile se? Router laga hai na office me?
Customer: Nahi to office me router laga hai to usse aap agar mere call se connected ho to fir aapke system me laptop jisme abhi aap IndiaMART check karte ho to usme to chal raha hoga na call.
Executive: Nahi call isme nahi chal raha hai matlab mobile call ke through kar rahe hai network aap.
Customer: Ha matlab jaise office me router laga abhi aap by lead kaise system pe dekhte ho na laptop pe dekh raha hu abhi filhal. System me kaise wifi router connection uske sath wo bhi nahi chal raha.
Executive: Okay to mobile pe dekh rahe ho aap. Mobile pe aapne apna normal net chalaya hoga mobile wala net wo call ke sath dikkat de raha hoga na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Koi nahi ye aapka ye dusra wala number whatsapp pe hai?
Customer: Jis number pe mai baat kar raha hu sir wo whatsapp hai.
Executive: Oh jispe mai baat kar raha hu. Ji ji.
Executive: To iska whatsapp sir ke paas hoga?
Customer: Ha uska whatsapp sir ke paas hoga.
Executive: Aur sir me SMS la. Ha wo bata rahe the cricket ka kuch.
Customer: Ji ji thik hai sir aapko 5-10 minute baad call karu iske baad me bata dijiyega please.
Executive: Ye 499 jo last me number hai iska whatsapp bhi sir ke paas rehta hai?
Customer: Ek minute mai batata hu aapko. Ye iska na whatsapp number de deta hu mai jo mobile isme hai na. 9 matlab wo whatsapp number de do jo aapke paas hai. Mai aapko whatsapp se hi kar deta hu to aapka chal jayega. Jo 499 hai na wo office ka hi hai.
Executive: Thik hai to is number se mai whatsapp kar raha hu aapko apne number se to jaise hi ek baar net chal jayega aap mere ko whatsapp pe message dal dena mai connect kar lunga.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Quantity written is more, buyer asks for less.

- Individual customers are more than business customers.

- Internet not working on system.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for quantity mismatch.

- Executive suggested checking rate instead of quantity.

- Executive will connect after the internet is working.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will inform executive on WhatsApp after internet works.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quantity, internet issue, indiamart, gst
